name: Fun Scoreboard LITE
description:
Who didn't want to own a scoreboard for games like Tablesoccer, Tableicehockey, Billard, Kicker or other result based fan games? This app is a fun app on the one hand. On the other hand it shows the results and also has an integrated timer which can be set from one to 45 minutes (in the full version). The limitation of the lite-version is that the timer can only be set on a maximum of 2 minutes and results can not reach higher than "2". All boards are available.

Features of the lite-version: three designs (Video-Board, LED-Board or hand-board); timer (can be set to 1 and 2 minutes (in the full version to 3, 5, 10, 20, 30, 45 or 90 too!)); results can be set from one to two and can be corrected of wrong

Features of the full version:
- three designs (Video-Board, LED-Board or hand-board)
- timer
- results can be set from one to 99 and can be corrected if wrong
- naming of the home team and the visitors
